target: I don't have a specific singer, but I do enjoy singing along with my friends.

source1: I bet it does. Do you have any hobbies you like to do in your spare time?
source2: I don't play many video games, but I do like to read. I love fantasy novels. What kind of video games do you like?
target: I like to play video games. I've been playing a lot of Call of Duty lately. What about you?

source1: I'm sure you'll be able to find something. What do you like to do for fun?
source2: I like playing video games as well. I also like to read. What kind of movies do you enjoy?
target: I like to play video games and watch movies. What about you? Do you have any hobbies?

source1: Mostly cats and dogs, but I also have chickens, cows, goats, and horses.
source2: I have 3 dogs, 2 cats, and 2 chickens. Do you have any pets?
target: That's a lot of animals! How many do you have? I have a dog and a cat.

source1: I love stamp collecting. I have a lot of them too. What else do you like to do?
source2: Museums are fun. I like going to the art museum on weekends.
target: I like collecting stamps as well. I also like to go to museums.

source1: Yes, they do.  The ROYal Flyer is an aircraft engine manufactured by General Motors.
source2: The Ford F-Series was the best-selling vehicle in the United States from 1948 to 1975.
target: Oh wow, I had no idea. I always thought they were made by Henry Ford.

source1: I will have to look into it. Do you have a favorite skatepark you like to go to?
source2: I like rollerblading, but I haven't been to a skate park in a long time.
target: Not really.  I just like skateboarding in general.  What about you?

source1: That's great to hear. What do you like to do in your spare time? I like to read.
source2: I don't really have a favorite author, but I do enjoy reading non-fiction. What about you?
target: Reading is a great way to pass the time. Do you have any favorite authors?

source1: I spend a lot of time outdoors, hiking, camping, and fishing.
source2: I like to go fishing on the lake near my house. It's very relaxing.
target: That sounds like fun. I like fishing too. Do you have a favorite place to fish?

source1: Pizza is one of the most popular foods in the world. I love it so much.
source2: I love that it can be topped with veggies, meats, and condiments.
target: I love pizza too! It's a traditional Italian dish consisting of a yeasted flatbread typically topped with tomato sauce and cheese and baked in an oven.

source1: Tofu has a lot of different textures and flavors depending on what you use it for.
source2: Tofu can also be used as a substitute for other meats such as lamb, pork, and seafood.
target: I love tofu. It's so versatile. It can be used in so many different dishes.

source1: Sounds interesting. I'll have to check it out. What else do you like to do?
source2: I like playing video games as well. I also like to read books and watch movies.
target: I like to play video games. What about you? Do you have any hobbies?

source1: I would love to go to South America, but I don't know where to start. What would you recommend?
source2: I've always wanted to go there. I think it would be amazing to see all of the islands.
target: I would recommend going to the Caribbean Sea. It is the most populous country in the Americas.

source1: I like to play video games. What about you? What do you like to do for fun?
source2: I like action and adventure games, but I also enjoy RPGs and strategy games.
target: I enjoy playing video games as well. I also like to read. What kind of video games do you play?

source1: That sounds like a fun job. Do you have any hobbies that you like to do in your spare time?
source2: I like playing video games as well. I also like to read books and watch movies. What kind of video games do you like?
target: I like to play video games.  What about you?  What are your hobbies?

source1: I like playing video games as well. I also like to read. What kind of video games do you play?
source2: I like action and adventure games. What do you like to do in your free time?
target: I'm a big fan of first person shooters. Do you have a favorite genre?

source1: They sure are. I like to play drums in my free time. Do you play any instruments?
source2: No, I don't play any musical instruments. I wish I could play an instrument though.
target: I used to play the piano when I was a kid, but I haven't picked it up in years.

source1: I love shrimp but I can't stand seafood in general. I'm allergic to shellfish.
source2: Yes, I have a peanut allergy. I have to be very careful with what I eat.
target: Oh no, I'm sorry to hear that. Do you have any other food allergies?

source1: I would love to, but I don't have a lot of free time. Do you have any hobbies?
source2: I like to bake as well. I love baking sweets and cakes. What about you?
target: I do!  I love to cook and bake.  What do you like to do?

source1: I like Keith Uban too. He was born and raised in Chicago, Illinois.
source2: Yes, he is a great artist. He has sold over 100 million records worldwide.
target: I like him too, he was born in 1974 and is an American singer, songwriter, actor, and record producer.

source1: It really is, you should give it a try. It's a great workout too.
source2: Yeah, it's a good way to stay in shape and get in shape.
target: I will have to look into it, I am always looking for new excercise to do.

source1: That's cool. Do you have any hobbies? I like to knit and crochet.
source2: I love knitting! It's so relaxing to me. What do you like to do in your spare time?
target: I don't have much time for hobbies these days, but I used to love knitting.

source1: Thank you, that means a lot to me. I'm trying to keep my head up.
source2: Thank you so much, I really appreciate it. I'll try my best to stay positive.
target: You are welcome. I am sure things will get better. Just keep your chin up!

source1: I don't have much time for hobbies. I spend most of my time on the computer.
source2: I read a lot of books. I love fantasy novels. Do you have a favorite genre?
target: That's too bad. What do you like to do when you are not working out?

source1: No, I haven't. I've heard good things about her, though. What's your favorite book of hers?
source2: I've seen the movies, but I've never read the books. Do you recommend them?
target: I really like the Harry Potter series. It's one of my favorite books of all time.

source1: What kind of dancing do you do? I like hip-hop and salsa.
source2: That's cool. Do you have a favorite kind of music you like to listen to while dancing?
target: I don't really have a style, I just do it for fun. Salsa is fun though.

source1: I would love to visit Vegas one day. It seems like such a fun place to visit.
source2: I have heard that it has a lot of casinos, gambling, and entertainment.
target: It is! It is also the largest city in the Mojave Desert, so there is a lot to do there.

source1: I'm not a big fan of hers either. I prefer more upbeat music. What kind of music do you like?
source2: I don't really have a favorite. I listen to whatever is on the radio. What do you do for a living?
target: I like all kinds of music, but my favorite band is the Beatles. What about you?

source1: I'm going to a christian dance music festival. It's going to be so much fun!
source2: It's a jazz concert. I've never been to one before so I'm really looking forward to it.
target: That sounds like a lot of fun! I hope you have a great time! What kind of music is it?

source1: I'm doing well. I just got back from a fishing trip. What do you like to do for fun?
source2: I like to fish for trout, salmon, and steelhead. What about you?
target: I like to play video games and watch movies. What kind of fishing did you do?

source1: It was, but it was for the best. I baked a lot of cookies and cakes.
source2: Baking is my favorite thing to do. I love to bake cakes and cookies.
target: I love baking! What kind of cakes did you make? I love chocolate chip cookies!

source1: I am 14 as well. Do you like video games? I play a lot of them.
source2: I like action and adventure games the most. What do you like to do for fun?
target: Yes, I love video games. What is your favorite genre? Mine is RPGs.

source1: He was born on August 2, 1948.  He was a great artist.
source2: Yes he was.  His music was very influential in the 1940s and 1950s.
target: He really was. He was one of the most influential artists of the 20th century.

source1: Yes, I am glad I got it back as well. It was a lot of money.
source2: I did, but it was worth it in the end. I was very grateful.
target: I bet it was. I hope you didn't have to pay a lot for it.

source1: I know what you mean.  I'm a truck driver so I see a lot of strange people.
source2: I agree. I drive a big rig so I get to see all kinds of weird people on the road.
target: Truck drivers are some of the most underpaid and underappreciated people in the world.

source1: I would love to, but I live in a small apartment and my landlord doesn't allow pets.
source2: I do have hobbies. I like to play video games and watch movies. What about you?
target: That's too bad. Maybe one day you'll be able to get one. Do you have any hobbies?

source1: That's really cool. I've always wanted to learn how to play an instrument. Do you play any other instruments?
source2: I used to play the piano when I was younger, but I haven't picked it up in a while.
target: I used to play the piano, but I don't play any instruments anymore.

source1: I love it too. It's a great way to get out of the house and get some fresh air.
source2: I like to go for walks in the woods and listen to music. What about you?
target: I agree, it's nice to get away from everything for a little bit. What do you like to do in your spare time?

source1: What do you do for work? I owe a lot of money for two monitors.
source2: That's cool. What do you like to do in your free time? I like to watch Superhero shows.
target: I work in a call center. I know how you feel, I've been there before.

source1: That's really cool. Do you grow a lot of fruits and veggies?
source2: I like to garden as well. I love to grow herbs, vegetables, and fruit in my garden.
target: I try to grow as many vegetables as I can.  It is very relaxing.  What do you like to do in your spare time?

source1: I love swimming, it's one of my favorite recreational activities. What do you like to do?
source2: That sounds like a lot of fun. I've never been to a beach before. Do you go often?
target: I like swimming too. I like to go to the beach and swim in the ocean.

source1: I've never played it, but I've heard it's a good game. What do you like about it?
source2: That sounds like fun. I'll have to check it out. Do you have a favorite character?
target: I like that it's an action-adventure first-person shooter game.

source1: It really is. I like to listen to it while I work out. What kind of music do you like?
source2: I like a lot of different types of music. My favorite band is Led Zeppelin.
target: I like all kinds of music, but my favorite genre is rock. What about you?

source1: Dogs are great, but cats are easier to take care of. Do you have a job?
source2: I do not. I am a stay at home mom. I wish I had a job though.
target: I do, I work at a grocery store as a cashier. How about you?

source1: That's cool. I like to hike in the mountains. What else do you like to do?
source2: I like swimming too. I also like fishing. What do you do for fun?
target: I like going to the beach and swimming in the ocean. How about you?

source1: That's true. I drink a lot of Mountain Dew. Do you drink soda?
source2: I don't drink much soda at all, but I do like the caffeine in it.
target: I do, but not as much as I used to. I'm trying to cut back.

source1: I don't really remember, but it was a long time ago.  I do enjoy lifting weights though.
source2: I used to be too, but then I got into weightlifting.  It's a great way to stay in shape.
target: That's cool. I've never been much of a lifter. I'm more of a runner.

source1: I love the music from the 80s. The pretenders are one of my favorite bands.
source2: I didn't know that. Do you like any of the other bands from that era?
target: I love them too! They were formed in Los Angeles, California in 1983.

source1: Ford Mustangs are great cars. I have a Ford Explorer.
source2: I love it! It's the best selling vehicle in the United States since 1962.
target: The Ford mustang is an American car manufactured by Ford. Do you like it?

source1: Thank you very much, that means a lot to me. I hope you have a great day!
source2: You are most welcome. Have a great rest of your day, and make sure to take care of yourself.
target: You are very welcome. Thank you. I will try to have a good day as well.

source1: Me too! I love all kinds of meats, vegetables, and condiments.
source2: Me too! Italian cuisine is one of the most popular in the world.
target: Me too. I love italian food so much. I could eat it every day.
